sentence.text: Genome-wide association studies have identified SNPs near negative regulation of neuron projection development at 10q21.2 that are associated with both breast cancer risk and mammographic density.

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development

sentence.text: There was weaker evidence for iCHAV4, located 5' of sulfur amino acid catabolic process, associated only with ER-positive breast cancer (OR = 0.93 [0.90-0.96]).

Chromosome conformation capture analysis showed that iCHAV2 interacts with the negative regulation of neuron projection development and autophagy (more than 600 kb away) promoters in normal and cancerous breast epithelial cells.

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development

sentence.text: Luciferase assays did not identify SNPs that affect transactivation of negative regulation of neuron projection development, but identified a protective haplotype in iCHAV2, associated with silencing of the autophagy promoter, implicating this gene in the etiology of breast cancer.

entity.text: negative regulation of neuron projection development
